channel.title: Texture glitch
channel.description:
I am running Black Mesa on a Mac through a Wineskin wrapper. It's not perfect, but it works. However, I am experiencing a texture pack glitch where certain items will turn eye-numbingly bright colors. I know the textures are there, because I can see them sometimes, but they often appear as these colors, and it's quite distracting. It started happening when I changed wrappers, because the one I was using had a Steam installation issue. Can anyone help me?
Link to the wrapper I am currently using: [url]https://portingteam.com/files/file/7630-dota-2/[/url]
Link to a screenshot of my issue: [url]https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bws9Hwks_FkgS0xhZVR2TlVlMGc/edit?usp=sharing[/url]

item.title: Texture glitch
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
That bright magenta means the textures are missing. This can be caused by many things, usually because said textures are corrupted, have missing/erroneous VMT values, or simply haven’t been included in your installation.

If a clean install downloaded from a different mirror doesn’t fix this, it’s probably a porting thing. Try your luck with bootcamp.

Read full topic
